Name: Seismic Toss
Effect: Single Target. Roll Fight-Type Damage Dice according to the User's Rank: Starter 1 Die / Rookie 2 Dice / Standard 4 Dice/ Advacned 6 Dice / Expert 8 Dice / Ace and forward 10 Dice. Ignore Defenses.
Description: The foe gets launched up to the sky, then falls face-first into the ground making it tremble. The stronger the user, the higher the launch.
